header_text: At work you've noticed more difficulty typing. You decide to email your boss to ask to take time off to focus on your health. You see a reply pop up in your email after a while, and you feel scared.

elements.text: Your boss is very kind in their reply and would like to meet with you. You can think clearly now and you are feeling more...

elements.name: At work you've noticed more difficulty typing. You decide to email your boss to ask to take time off to focus on your health. You see a reply pop up in your email after a while, and you feel scared. _Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
